page.title: 01Introduction
page.content:
Introduction This region of farmland lies between the northerly village of Llanwarne and the southerly one of St.Weonard's. It is mainly in the parishes of Llanwarne, St. Weonard's,Pencoyd and Tretire. The fifty houses and farms are scattered, apart from the additional twelve houses of the Monkton Council Estate (on the A.466).
There are no community centres except at St. Weonard's and Llanwarne,both just outside this l2 km. block, which both have a church and a village hall, the former has a school and a shop. Another shop, garage and pub lie 2 miles north of the area people tend to use cars as public transport is limited and only along main roads.
